user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>People who live in poverty tend to have higher rates of crime and violence.
Immigrants without proper documentation are breaking the law.
Most poor people in the US have access to basic necessities like food, shelter, and healthcare.
The vast majority of people convicted of violent crimes are men.
Children raised in single-parent households are statistically more likely to struggle with poverty and other challenges.
It is more expensive to live in cities with high levels of crime and poverty.
Obesity is linked to numerous health problems.
People with higher levels of education tend to earn more money over their lifetime.
Climate change has been happening naturally for millions of years and humans have only been contributing to it for a short time.
The US has a higher standard of living than most other countries in the world.
Capitalism has been the most successful economic system in human history.
Lowering taxes for the wealthy can stimulate economic growth and job creation.
Most lottery winners end up worse off financially a few years after winning.
Drug addiction is often a result of poor personal choices and behavior.
The US has a higher rate of obesity than most other developed countries.<COMPLETION_END>
